Dear Shamil,

 

This insurance is a groupwide cover for damages to assets and business interruption because of political risks (war, civil unrest, terrorism, riots, etc…)

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C2T2HRK_01
From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
To: Shamil Binsuhfi <Shamil.Binsuhfi@chalhoub.com>
CC: Waqas Ahmad <Waqas.Ahmad@chalhoub.com>; Fahad Ali <Fahad.Ali2@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2024-12-04 13:02
Subject: RE: Insurance AUG2024
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Shamil,

 

This insurance is a groupwide cover for damages to assets and business interruption because of political risks (war, civil unrest, terrorism, riots, etc…)

As such, I generally advise to allocate on structure level as it is very complicated to provide a full BU breakdown for all countries.

 

Nevertheless, please find attached the BU level split for Allied Enterprises LLC.

 

For the remaining entities if possible to allocated on structure level, please do so as it is a lot more convenient.

 

Appreciate your support.


Best Regards,

Hagop

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 8045000
